H0.text: What is the more correct term for the sport of archery. Toxophily

H1.text: What is the more correct term for the sport of archery. Arcism

H2.text: What is the more correct term for the sport of archery. Bowmanship

H3.text: What is the more correct term for the sport of archery. Endong

A4.text: A person who practices archery is typically called an archer, bowman, or toxophilite.
